title: Croque monsieur kites
description: Oh la la. One of these breakfast pastries will keep you going all day long – packing creamy cheese sauce, pancetta and mushrooms atop rich Danish pastry.For this recipe you will need a freestanding mixer with a dough hook.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz pancetta, 12 rashers left whole, the rest sliced into small pieces
1 tsp porcini powder (you can make your own by pulsing dried porcini mushrooms in a food processor)
1 medium free-range egg, beaten with 2 tsp milk
